data.prayer: Please, teach the 110 believers in Notranjsko-kraška, Slovenia how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Notranjsko-kraška, Slovenia
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 110 believers in Notranjsko-kraška, Slovenia a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.section_summary: On average, 3 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in Notranjsko-kraška, Slovenia.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Father, please give the church in the state of Notranjsko-kraška prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the state of Notranjsko-kraška that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Pivka
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Pivka, Notranjsko-kraška, Slovenia.
Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Notranjsko-kraška to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Notranjsko-kraška, Slovenia.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.section_summary:
the state of Notranjsko-kraška, Slovenia has a population of 52,900.

We estimate Notranjsko-kraška has 110 people who might know Jesus, 28,489 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 24,301 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 480 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Notranjsko-kraška, Slovenia to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.
